name: Mennecks Raumstation (Demo)
description:
The Golden Age of Space Travel is over, now your planet suffers from ressource shortages. You're one of the chosen ones that get to scavenge old space stations for ressources, mostly because nobody else wanted this job.

Use your laser to slice your own platforms to navigate the place, drag them around, and even repair them for a fully nondestructive gameplay!

This is the first level, created to estimate the scope of the full game. The result of the test: As it stands I don't have the time or ressources for the full thing, so this Demo is where it's at for now.

Tools Used:
Unreal Engine 4
WeLoveIndies
FMOD
